prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: John F. Cox Account Book, 1849-1859. Local government records collection, Powhatan County Court Records. The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This item came in a transfer of court papers from Powhatan County.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: The account book was used as an exhibit in the chancery suit Edwin Fleming and wife versus Administrator of Frederick Hicks. It was heard in the Powhatan County Circuit Court. The suit involved the division of slaves owned by Hicks among his heirs.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: John F. Cox Account Book, 1849-1859, records transactions performed by Cox as administrator of Frederick Hicks.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: For additional information see the Powhatan County Chancery Causes, Edwin Fleming and wife versus Administrator of Frederick Hicks available on the Library of Virginia's Chancery Records Index. The index number is 1859-002.
